definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: The problem is modelled as a fuzzy multicriteria decision-making one.
sentences.chinese: 问题是仿照作为一个模糊的多目标决策之一。

sentences.english: This park is laid out in imitation of Grand View Garden in "a Dream of Red Mansions".
sentences.chinese: 这个公园是仿照《红楼梦》里的大观园设计的。

sentences.english: Mary does her hair after the ancient Greek fashion.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽仿照古希腊的式样做头发。

sentences.english: Now write sentences in the past tense from the following prompts.
sentences.chinese: 仿照示例，用过去时将所给词语连接成句。

sentences.english: The mausoleum was built in imitation of the Qin Dynasty's capital, Xianyang.
sentences.chinese: 这陵园是仿照秦代都城咸阳建造的。

sentences.english: Bosworth said that the service was modeled after chat.
sentences.chinese: 博斯沃斯表示这项服务是仿照聊天室。

sentences.english: The garden has a lake copied from a noted one in China called Xihu.
sentences.chinese: 公园里有一个湖是仿照中国著名的西湖建造的。

sentences.english: The Garden of Harmonious Interest was modeled on a garden in Wuxi.
sentences.chinese: 谐趣园是仿照无锡的一座花园造的。

sentences.english: This jacket of mine is patterned after his.
sentences.chinese: 我这件上衣是仿照他的那件做的。

sentences.english: Lantern and is modeled on the shape of the horse with Bamboo bar into a papier .
sentences.chinese: 其“马灯”，是仿照马的形状用竹篾扎纸糊成。

sentences.english: Write good questions for the answers, like the example.
sentences.chinese: 仿照例句，根据回答写出合适的问题。

sentences.english: This is copy, But the quality is as good as original goods.
sentences.chinese: 这是仿照的，但质量和正牌的一样。

sentences.english: It produced a model worthy of replication throughout Africa.
sentences.chinese: 它产生了一种值得全非洲仿照的模式。

sentences.english: Suzuki said the boat is modeled after a zipper tab.
sentences.chinese: 康広称，该摩托艇就是仿照拉链扣设计的。

sentences.english: Look at the pictures on page fifty-five. Let's do the pattern drills imitating the example.
sentences.chinese: 看第五十五页的图片，让我们仿照例句做句型训练。

sentences.english: New York has followed the example of Paris in establishing a brigade of police dogs.
sentences.chinese: 纽约已仿照巴黎的做法建立了一支警犬队。

definition: to copy/to produce sth after a model/to counterfeit
to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
virtually the same/differing only on small points
old system/weights and measures of former times
to carry on as before/to follow (an old custom etc)
